title: srI raama raama jitharaama
sahitya:
shrI rAma shrI rAma jitarAma gatakAma

caraNam 1

 dEva Emi dOva nannu brOva vEga rAvA
   
caraNam 2

 bAla bhaktapAla suguNashIla tALa jAla
   
caraNam 3

 dhIra susharIra nirvikAra ElukOra
   
caraNam 4

 Adarinca rAdA namma lEdA mariyAdA
   
caraNam 5

 Aru ripula pOru dIrcuvAru evarunnAru
   
caraNam 6

 rAya manasu rAya munigEya tALadAya
   
caraNam 7

 vAdu kArAdu ikamIda gati lEdu
   
caraNam 8

 cinta dIrcuTa kenta sEvinca shrI kAnta
   
caraNam 9

 shrI nAthavanilOna iTlu gAna nijamEna
 
caraNam 10

 paddu tappavadu E proddu maravavaddu
 
caraNam 11

 vinna brOvu nannu brOvakunna viDananna
 
caraNam 12

 shrI jAnakirAja tyAgarAja krpa pUja
